title: Guam: Tumon Bay Resort with Beachfront Infinity Pool
description: Discover island paradise on the beautiful island of Guam at the oceanfront Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Guam, an IHG Hotel. This peaceful property sits just steps from the pristine Tumon Beach. You'll be spoiled by the three onsite eateries, stunning beachfront infinity pool, state-of-the-art fitness centre and endless watersports. When you're ready to explore Guam, find yourself centrally located nearby breathtaking beaches, waterfalls and surreal hikes.
